column4: is it possible to cut and paste directly into virtualbox from ubuntu 10.10?
songbird? not sure about the web ui but it's xul?
sorry no, then. But I'm sure there must be many. I used a couple of curses based ones years back that had web uis
does ubuntu allow for more support of the traditional X way of cut paste & copy?
middle button pasting I mean
i can middle button paste, justt highlight what you want to paste
I can do it in most places, but for example not in open office and a few other places
works for me in libreoffice (though i am on arch)
works in xubuntu with openoffice too
tried installing the guest additions?
yes, but it made my screen look a tad inflated
there should be a screen resolution setting somewhere in ubuntu (sorry not sure where, i use xubuntu)
i thought you were running ubuntu inside virtualbox?
no the other way around
what vm is it?
then change the screen resolution within xp (think of the vbox window as xp's monitor)
you sure you installed the guest additions and restarted the vm? you should get more resolutions
check alsamixer in a terminal
none muted?
no worries :)
gnome2 is no longer supported
